channel.title: Disconnecting help
channel.description: Okay, whenever i log on, i click to walk, and my client closes. it said error with runtime, so i re-dl'd java, and it still doesn't work. Can anyone help me?i remember fixing this before, but don't remember how.

item.title: Disconnecting help
item.dc:creator: @kickyamom50 kickyamom50
item.description:
@kickyamom50 wrote:

alright, i will try.

Read full topic

item.title: Disconnecting help
item.dc:creator: @DivineSouls DivineSouls
item.description:
@DivineSouls wrote:

I’m assuming that you have a windows 7 - 64-bit computer? If so, you need to uninstall your current JDK. Go to this website -

http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/jdk6-jsp-136632.html

Click download, and when it asks you to select your platform (it should be a drop-down menu) You need to select “windows”. This is the 32-bit version of JDK, with 64-bit on windows 7 it doesn’t work correctly.

Read full topic
